summary: VEHICLE WAS NEWLY PURCHASED IN 2007 FROM SUZUKI DEALERSHIP.  GRINDING NOISE FROM STEERING WHEEL AFTER 6MONTHS..TOLD THAT IT IS RUBBER RUBBING AGAINST RUBBER.  ENGINE LIGHT REMAINS ON AFTER HAVING A PROBLEM WITH STARTING CAR AFTER FUELING.  CONSTANT PROBLEM WITH WHEEL ALIGNMENT AND TIRE WEAR.  *TR
